title: 1 Bedroom w/ A/C, Controlled Entry, On-Site Laundry,
posting_body: 2025 E. Virginia Ave. managed by Cornerstone Apartments
This lovely property is located at 2025 E. Virginia Ave.
This building offers studios and one-bedroom apartments.

Located in the 80209 ZIP code, this property is five and half blocks from the gorgeous Washington Park, that includes Smith Lake and gardens that replicate George Washington's gardens at his home at Mt. Vernon.
This property is also close to shopping and dining establishments located on Old South Gaylord Street.
For more details, contact our office at
or apply the on our website!
To schedule a showing please contact our leasing team at
